title: 【連登fake news】【連環追撞】「文化差異」為由 難民強姦犯竟脫罪？

replies.msg:
tl;dr版
個難民係無罪釋放
但原因唔係乜柒「文化差異」
要屈左膠都唔好咁過分
----------------------------------------------------------

原po: https://lihkg.com/thread/952186/page/1
最初睇到標題都嚇一跳
嘩屌唔係咁on9啊嘛
click入去，理所當然地
連登式圍爐打飛機自high啦

眾所9知，連登仔唯一會fact check嘅時候
就係媒體報導對侵侵不利嘅時候

中文版個source係自由時報
http://news.ltn.com.tw/news/world/breakingnews/2650527
但係篇文講明係轉載自WND

OK 咁WND係乜春呢？
正如會員「英文語達人」響#62所講

就算你唔信wiki，根據media bias/fact check

https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/world-net-daily-wnd/

睇到呢度都有啲懷疑篇野係咪流料
而WND篇文
https://www.wnd.com/2018/11/muslim-rapes-teen-girl-acquitted-due-to-cultural-norms/
係引用自voice of europe
// The refugee also was charged with sexually assaulting another young girl. Both incidents happened in 2015. He was given a suspended sentenced of two years in prison for the sexual-assault charge, reported Voice of Europe, citing the French news site La Manche Libre//

咁voice of europe又係乜柒呢
屌又係一撚樣

https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/voice-of-europe/

接連兩個fake news網，仲要篇文係quote上quote，引用嘅係La Manche Libre
https://www.lamanchelibre.fr/actualite-620903-normandie-juge-pour-le-viol-d-une-lyceenne-il-est-acquitte
咁先至去到盡頭

請各位欣賞一下
呢篇咁聳人聽聞嘅文章經過幾多手
la manche libre-->voice of europe-->wnd-->自由時報-->連登
一陣畀HK01 copy埋咁就變成六手「新」聞

ok咁篇新聞真定假呢？
to say the least partially fake
感謝filibuster_HK巴打響原po#202 提供法新社嘅fact check
(in case you don't know what the fuck is afp: https://mediabiasfactcheck.com/afp-agence-france-presse/)
https://factuel.afp.com/non-un-homme-na-pas-ete-acquitte-de-viol-parce-quil-navait-pas-les-codes-culturels
原文係法文，我用google translate；如果有巴打識法文煩請補充

疑犯脫罪嘅原因
係因為法庭唔認為 疑犯可以將受害人嘅行為理解為對性行為嘅抗拒
//all in a context where neither the procedure nor the debates will have made it possible to determine whether the few moderate expressions of reserve of the girl may have been, as an extension of what has just been described, be perceived as a refusal of the sexual relation, or only the expression of an initial reluctance with respect to a first experience of sexual relation or with respect to 'a sexual experience with a stranger'//
「文化差異」呢個詞根本同法庭判決無關
// At no point in the eight pages of this judgment is the question of " cultural codes" mentioned or used to justify acquittal.//

就連受害人嘅律師都感到驚訝，話辯方無用過自己origin作為抗辯理由
// His comments are reinforced by the own lawyer of the girl who had lodged a complaint for rape, Me Jagou: quoted by Ouest-France , he said " extremely surprised that it ignites as well ." According to him, " he is false information or misinterpretation. The defense did not use the origin of the accused as a lever at all. "//


結論：

話說隔離po似乎又係fake news
［左癌擴散］德國法庭判禁止童婚違憲，因為所有婚姻受德國基本法保護
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/EzpbnV

正皮俾樓主

其實你將本土派代入feminist就會容易理解啲

我相信有兩種解釋
首先係佢地雖然未必完全同意彼此嘅行為/立場
但係通常都會優先攻擊共同論敵 (i.e. 所謂嘅manosphere)
正如民族黨同埋本民前雖然立場有分別
但係會打港共同埋泛民先
始終大家某程度上都係同一條船

另一種（近乎相反）嘅解釋
係feminism內部平日一向互相批鬥，只係你身處其外無留意
例如有種feminist叫TERF，基本上係排斥transgender（定係non-binary之類），認為呢啲性小眾淡化咗「女性」呢個身分
呢一派就會同intersectional feminism（主流）有衝突
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AQPWI7cEJGs
不過外人就唔會理解，一律將佢地當成homogeneous group

眾所9知，連登仔唯一會fact check嘅時候
就係媒體報導對侵侵不利嘅時候
